a0.speaker: Jane:
a0.dialogue: Get back here, you liar. Do you dare say this concert is a money-laundering scheme for a cult?

a1.speaker: Youmu:
a1.dialogue: I guess so, but that is just my guess. So, take this with a punch of salt.

a2.speaker: Youmu:
a2.dialogue: And anyway, since I know that the big shot behind the concert is near, there's no time to lose.

a3.speaker: Youmu:
a3.dialogue: You can try to stop me, but it's too late now. I am certain that I will see the big shot right away!
